text: Pag may refer to: ==Places== * Pag, Croatia **Pag (island), an island in the Adriatic Sea, part of Croatia **Pag (town), the largest town on the island of Pag * Pag, Iran (disambiguation) ==People== * Michel Pagliaro, musician nicknamed "Pag" ==Other uses== * pag, the ISO 639-2 and ISO 639-3 code for the Pangasinan language * Pag, nickname for Leoncavallo's 1892 opera Pagliacci, often performed on a double bill with Mascagni's Cavalleria rusticana known colloquially as "Cav and Pag" * Pag cheese, a sheep milk cheese from the Croatian island Pag ==See also== * PAG (disambiguation) * Pags (disambiguation) * Professional agrologist (P.Ag)
title: Pag
